name: A diamond encrusted silk sash
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity pathetically.
It increases the users constitution somewhat.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence somewhat.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
